description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Toggle' which implements a themed toggle switch with animated thumb movement. It leverages React hooks such as useMemo, useCallback, useEffect, and React.memo for optimization. The component also uses React Native's Animated API for smooth transition animations, and integrates with a theming context for styling.

methods.name: Toggle
methods.description: A React functional component representing a themed toggle switch with animated thumb movement.
